entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Should we consider adding a "Date/Time/Number format data is wrong" bug category? #96101
  • `TraceUtils.CopyStringDictionary()` is broken #96092
  • High memory consumption of .Net 6 app on Linux #96091
  • Publish 9.0 version of Microsoft.Private.Intellisense package #96084
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] rationalize #includes in the native runtime #96081

Closed

  • Why does System.Text.Json throw an exception when deserializing polymorphic types in case $type is not the first property #96088
  • TypeLoadException when attempting to create an instance of a struct of particular type #84999
    Future
  • Assertion failed '(fgEntryBB->bbRefs == 1) && (fgEntryBB->bbPreds == nullptr)' #96038
  • Is there a document for Coreclr on the Android platform #90160
  • Clean up dependencies on 8.0 packages. #92502
    9.0.0
  • Failures in x86 coreclr pgostress #95887
  • Assertion failed: 'emitJumpCrossHotColdBoundary(srcOffs, dstOffs) == false' #95946
    9.0.0
  • [mono][tests] System.Numerics.Vectors.Tests attempting to JIT compile method #96041
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAot: Remove never-defined FEATURE_RWX_MEMORY #96100
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Cleanup some string operating functions #96099
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Rename IsOSXLike to IsApplePlatform in libraries #96098
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix `CopyStringDictionary` #96093
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • Rename IsMacOS to IsApplePlatform in the JIT #96090
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update the bit field of encoding function names #96082
    arch-arm64-sve
  • Add dumpers for new loop data structures #96080
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix passing of valuetypes with a non-8 byte aligned size on arm64+ios/macos. #96079
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix potential NREs in ConfigurationBindingGenerator #96078
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • extract side-effects from op1 of GT_COMMA #96077
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [RISC-V] Add branch label names to disasm #96057
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Change Native AOT ThreadBuffer.m_threadId to OS thread id #96075
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove references to 8.0.0-rc.1 packages #96085
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Bump StyleCop.Analyzers to latest version #96086
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove Android from UnsupportedOSPlatforms in System.IO.Ports #96087
    area-System.IO.Ports
  • Remove unused OSVERSIONINFO from pal.h #96089
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Fix hot/cold splitting #96074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disallow reuse of PInvoke transition frame by marshalling helper calls #96047
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Refactored GCToEEInterface and RedhawkGCInterface implementations into separate files. #95991
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix the decoding of some runtime invoke wrappers. #96072
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono

Updated

  • [wasm] Extract `src/mono/browser` from `src/mono/wasm` #95940
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Allow specifying IndentText when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement KMAC #96025
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] introduce JSProxyContext #95959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • ReadAsStream/CopyTo should reset result/destination stream position #95827
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #95404
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Support library mode with NativeAOT on iOS-like platforms #93658
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_ALWAYS fall-through check in Compiler::fgFindInsertPoint #96070
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [aot][browser] Stop throwing in CultureInfo getter #95910
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_CX_4A group #95918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser][fix] maxParallelDownloads #95870
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Fix crash when processing aliases that do not point at names #96048
    area-System.Text.Json, source-generator
  • JIT ARM64/SVE2: Add increment/decrement from predicate register instructions #94811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [RISC-V] Simplify codegen for div/mod #96068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-16

Issues

Created

  • dotnet command to export a .sln file as a sequence of dotnet commands #37554
  • Replace DOS stub due to potential copyright issue #37550

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Extension lowering #7771

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update "Better function member" section in params-collections.md #7768

Updated

  • Add proposal for BinaryCompatOnlyAttribute #7707

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Convert to 'switch' statement changes behaviour #71295
  • IDE0120 does not work in various cases (Where+Count) #71293
  • Poor codegen for collection expression spread (ROS<T> -> ImmutableArray<T>) #71292
  • Use `ReadOnlySpan<T>` properties instead of static array fields #71291
  • SearchGraphQueryTests_NavigateTo.SearchForMember is broken in release/dev17.9 branch #71290

Closed

  • default 'csharp_style_prefer_primary_constructors' to false #71294
  • Collection expressions should use AddRange(ReadOnlySpan) when available and compatible to bulk add spread elements. #69626
  • IDE0305 recommends collection expression that results in worse IL #70656
    17.9
  • Analyzer suggestion `IDE0305` ("Collection initialization can be simplified") leads to performance regressions #69988

PullRequests

Merged

  • Collection expression spread optimization #71195
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Collection expressions: synthesize singleton list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #71147
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Params Collections: Implement "Better function member" section of the proposal #71271
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Use runtime helper `CreateSpan` for `stackalloc` of non-byte arrays #71261
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.9 #71274
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix implementing abstract method with type parameter constaint on specific reference type #71287
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Provide 'return' keyword in attribute context for accessor #71288
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Speed up integration test build by only building required dependencies #71289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: method type re-inference #71214
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot #52852
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #52851
  • Debugging With InteractiveAuto When Changes To Webassembly #52850

Closed

  • How to implement exception handler of last resort? #52786

PullRequests

Created

  • Using FrozenDictionaries in IEndpointAddressScheme implementations #52854
    community-contribution, area-networking

Updated

  • Treating empty string in form post as null for nullable value types #52499
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix metrics duration and http.route tag with exception handling #52790
    area-hosting, 8.0.x
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Going back using 'Shell.Current.GoToAsync("..")' causes a crash, but only when using a Mouse on an Android. #19461
  • Shell.NavBarHasShadow not working correctly on Android #19458
  • FontFamily is Not Recognized in UnPackaged WinUI App #19457
  • maui 8.0 app not run. #19456
  • problem as i change the first thing #19455

Closed

  • In Android, adding views in SizeChanged event does not show the newly added views #19391
    Backlog
  • Cannot find `ShellHandler` under `Microsoft.Maui.Handlers` #16424
  • 建个独立开发者技术交流群，欢迎大佬加入 #19460
  • [Android] Entry clear button requires tap to the right of appearance #18803
    Triaged
  • [regression/7.0.0] Entry clear button doesn't work under Android 13 + NET 7.0 #17453
    Under Consideration
  • If Listview IsEnabled is false, items are still enabled #6581
    6.0.300
  • [iOS] ZIndex + ScrollView issue #19423
  • OnNavigatedTo is fired when leaving a Modal page #16395

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix some UI Test timings #19462
  • Devices.Sensors.Location: rework argument handling in constructors #19459
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19454
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [Android] Correctly clear text tapping the clear button on Entry #17543
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, stale, Under Consideration

Updated

  • Move the device test for ShowsKeyboardOnFocus to Appium #18747
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, area/keyboard
  • Translucent and Transparent NavigationBar on iOS #19204
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, .NET 8 SR2
  • [net8.0] Update with main #19381
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using SQL Server, Database.CanConnect throws an exception when password is blank. #32630

Closed

  • Error in EF Core index generation with Npgsql - incorrect COLLATE placement #32609
  • Incorrect simple join table determination in reverse engineering leads to incorrect code generation #28905
    9.0.0
  • Miracle intech #32625

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow generated class members to have same name as generated classes when casing differs #32629
  • Make ITableMappingBase.IncludesDerivedTypes null if there are no derived types #32628

Merged

  • Don't detect join table with other incoming references as a simple join table #32627

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682
  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588
